text: @SecBernhardt @PressSec @FBI Hey @PressSec , why won't you wear a mask? You have a 6 month old infant at home, isn't that correct? Do you not care that you share the same space with those who refuse to mask up and that you can expose your infant (with underdeveloped immune system) to coronavirus? #COVID19
